info.title: Application Folder manager for accounts
info.description:
Manages all account folders for the current running application.
NOTE: For each call it checks if there is an active application. If not, returns false every time. All paths are relative to the application root folder or the application shared folder root. The shared folder is one for all applications, so be careful of what you are storing there.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Creates a new folder in the specified location in the account application folder.

parameter.name: $shared
parameter.description: Set true to get to the application shared folder. If false, it will get the application private folder. It is false by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, False on failure.
